meanings.sent1: The hackees were playing in the park.
meanings.sent2: I saw many hackees running around the playground.

meanings.sent5: The hackees giggled and chased each other, full of energy.

meanings.definition: hackees: third person singular present of hackee
meanings.sent1: She hackees every morning before school.
meanings.sent2: He hackees his way through the dense forest.
meanings.sent3: The cat hackees lazily in the sun, enjoying the warmth.
meanings.sent4: The river hackees through the valley, carving its path.
meanings.sent5: The wind hackees through the trees, rustling the leaves.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, the hackees were all over the yard.
meanings.sent2: Last week, we found hackees hiding in the bushes.
